names: BNG_PPPOE_INFRA.current_subscriber_count { host: 52e7925196e0, path: , pfe_no: , MODEL: MX480, device: 10.216.96.117, component: smid, sblock_no: , slot: , VERSION: 23.4R1.9, _component_id: 65535 }

targets.query: SELECT mean("current_subscriber_count") FROM "BNG_PPPOE_INFRA" WHERE $timeFilter group by time(60s)

list.definition: show tag values from BNG_PPPOE with key="device"
list.label: Router
list.name: rtr
list.query: show tag values from BNG_PPPOE with key="device"

list.definition: show tag values from BNG_PPPOE_INFRA with key="slot" where device=~/$rtr/
list.label: FPC Slot
list.name: fpc
list.query: show tag values from BNG_PPPOE_INFRA with key="slot" where device=~/$rtr/

list.definition: show tag values from BNG_PPPOE_INFRA with key="pfe_no" where slot=~/$fpc/
list.label: PFE Num
list.name: pfe
list.query: show tag values from BNG_PPPOE_INFRA with key="pfe_no" where slot=~/$fpc/

list.definition: show tag values from BNG_PPPOE_INFRA with key="sblock_no" where pfe_no=~/$pfe/
list.label: Sched. Block
list.name: sched
list.query: show tag values from BNG_PPPOE_INFRA with key="sblock_no" where pfe_no=~/$pfe/
